forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. West wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle embrace of cloud cover cloaks the city, conjuring a serene mist that wraps around its iconic skyline. With temperatures resting comfortably around 60 degrees, the atmosphere feels mild, with a subtle westerly breeze softly rustling through the streets. Tonight’s clouds whisper tales of a true San Francisco evening—an invitation to gaze skyward and contemplate the day’s fleeting moments.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the sun will peek through the layers of clouds, promising a day tinged with warmth as the high reaches towards 67 degrees. A soft dance of west-southwest winds, accompanied by occasional gusts, may usher in a lively ambiance, making it an exquisite opportunity to wander the city’s diverse neighborhoods. Gentle layers—a light jacket or a cozy sweater—will provide the perfect balance against marine chill in the air. This weather motif speaks of endless possibilities, where a leisurely stroll down the Embarcadero or a quiet sit at a local café could be just the remedy one desires. 

In this beautiful, ever-changing landscape, take a moment to connect with the essence of the city—the whispers of fog and the embrace of the night remind us of the beauty in both stillness and movement.
